Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_speaker_type

The function AIL_set_3D_speaker_type sets the type of speaker system that the 3D provider should use.

void AIL_set_3D_speaker_type(
  HPROVIDER provider,
  S32 speaker_type
);

In Parameters

provider
indicates the provider to set.
speaker_type
indicates type of speaker system. It can be one of the MILES_SPEAKER_TYPE constants.

Discussion

You should always provider your users with a way to set the speaker system - depending on the provider, it can make a huge difference in the 3D quality.

Different providers use the speaker setting in different ways. Some use the speaker type to switch to completely different spacializing algorithms, some do nothing at all.

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_speaker_type
Related Basic Types: HPROVIDER, MILES_SPEAKER_TYPE, S32, void
